bug.author: SikhNerd
bug.summary: Unable to fully disable metrics collection
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Setting gatherUsageStats = false doesn't fully disable metrics collection <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug: Create a new streamlit file. Ensure gatherUsageStats = false is set in the config.toml and run the script. <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
I would expect no network requests to segment <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Still many requests get sent to segment, which include a unique ID. <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
no <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.47.4 Python version: Python 3.7.3 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? No OS version: Ubuntu 19.04 Browser version: Firefox 69.0.1
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
Can provide network requests if required.
